\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \alpha ,\, \beta ,\, \gamma ,\, \delta ,\, \alpha ,\, \beta ,\, \gamma ,\, \delta $ & \ottcom{type variables} \\
 $ \ottmv{n} ,\, \ottmv{m} ,\, \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{k} $ & \ottcom{index variables} \\
 $ \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} $ & \ottcom{term variable} \\
 $ \widehat{x} ,\, \widehat{y} $ & \ottcom{term algorithmic variable} \\
}}

\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbin{< >}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{refl} \, e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{\_}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otteInline}{\ottprodinline{}{e  ,\ p}{\Coloneqq}{{\ottmv{x}} \mid {\mathbin{< >}} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{\{}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{\}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, e} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid { \widehat{x}  [  \sigma  ] } \mid {\ottkw{\_}}}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ D}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ 1 }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; B}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; B}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, A}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ D}{\Coloneqq}{{ 1 } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e \, \ottkw{in} \, A}}}

\newcommand{\ottce}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ce}  ,\ \ottnt{cp}}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\bullet}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  \ottnt{ce}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  \ottnt{ce}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{refl} \, \ottnt{ce}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{cp}  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ce}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottceInline}{\ottprodinline{}{\ottnt{ce}  ,\ \ottnt{cp}}{\Coloneqq}{{\bullet} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  \ottnt{ce}} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  cA  .\,  e} \mid {\lambda^{\forall}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  \ottnt{ce}} \mid {\ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}} \mid {\ottkw{refl} \, \ottnt{ce}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{cp}  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  cA  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  cB  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{ce}  \ottsym{)}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \mid {\ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottcA}{
\ottrulehead{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  A }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcAInline}{\ottprodinline{}{cA  ,\ cB}{\Coloneqq}{{ \Pi  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { \forall  \ottmv{x} : cA  . \,  B } \mid { \forall  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  cB } \mid { \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  \ottnt{ce_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  A } \mid { e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  cA }}}

\newcommand{\otts}{
\ottrulehead{\sigma}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\cdot}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottsInline}{\ottprodinline{}{\sigma}{\Coloneqq}{{\cdot}}}

\newcommand{\ottVars}{
\ottrulehead{V}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\cdot}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{V_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  V_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concatenate}}}

\newcommand{\ottVarsInline}{\ottprodinline{}{V}{\Coloneqq}{{\cdot} \mid {\ottmv{x}} \mid {V_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  V_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottSVars}{
\ottrulehead{sV}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\cdot}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{sV_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  sV_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concatenate}}}

\newcommand{\ottSVarsInline}{\ottprodinline{}{sV}{\Coloneqq}{{\cdot} \mid {\ottmv{x}} \mid {sV_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  sV_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\cdot}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{sx} \, \ottsym{:}  A}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concatenate}}}

\newcommand{\ottGInline}{\ottprodinline{}{\Gamma}{\Coloneqq}{{\cdot} \mid {\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A} \mid {\ottkw{sx} \, \ottsym{:}  A} \mid {\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottMG}{
\ottrulehead{M\Gamma}{\Coloneqq}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\cdot}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \vdash  \widehat{x}  \Leftarrow  A}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{M\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  M\Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concatenate}}}

\newcommand{\ottMGInline}{\ottprodinline{}{M\Gamma}{\Coloneqq}{{\cdot} \mid {\Gamma  \vdash  \widehat{x}  \Leftarrow  A} \mid {M\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  M\Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\otte\ottinterrule
\ottA\ottinterrule
\ottce\ottinterrule
\ottcA\ottinterrule
\otts\ottinterrule
\ottVars\ottinterrule
\ottSVars\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottinterrule
\ottMG\ottafterlastrule
}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFVarName}[0]{WfWFVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFVarLabel}[0]{WfWFVar}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \in  V}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFVarName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFVarLabel}
}

}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%

}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFLamName}[0]{WfWFLam}

}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \lambda^{\Pi}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  A  .\,  e \, \ottkw{WF}}{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSName}[0]{WfWFAppNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSLabel}[0]{WfWFAppNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoS{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFAppNoSLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad sV  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFAppName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFAppLabel}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSName}[0]{WfWFSubstNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSLabel}[0]{WfWFSubstNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  p \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{WF}}%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \mathbin{;}  \cdot  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoS{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoSLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstName}[0]{WfWFSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstLabel}[0]{WfWFSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  p \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{WF}}%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{WF}}%
\ottpremise{sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFSubstName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFSubstLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFSubst{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFSubstName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFSubstLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSName}[0]{WfWFLetNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSLabel}[0]{WfWFLetNoS}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoS}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  \ottkw{let} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoS{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSName}{#1\ottdruleWfWFLetNoSLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderWfWF}[0]{$V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e \, \ottkw{WF}$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWfWF}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderWfWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFSVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFMVar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFPLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFRefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFAppNoS{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFSubstNoS{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFSubst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFLetNoS{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnWfWFLabeled}[2][]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#2]{\ottdefnHeaderWfWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFSVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFMVarLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFUnitLabeled[#1]{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFPLamLabeled[#1]{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfWFReflLabeled[#1]{}}

%% defn TWF

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitLabel}[0]{WfTWFUnit}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash   1  \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFUnit{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFUnitName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFUnitLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}[0]{WfTWFPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabel}[0]{WfTWFPi}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPi}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash   \Pi  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B  \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFPi{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFPiName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFPiLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}[0]{WfTWFForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabel}[0]{WfTWFForall}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \vdash  B \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash   \forall  \ottmv{x} : A  . \,  B  \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFForall{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFForallName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFForallLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}[0]{WfTWFEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabel}[0]{WfTWFEq}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottkw{WF} \quad V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{WF}}%
}{
V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash   e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  =  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A  \, \ottkw{WF}}{%
{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfTWFEq{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfTWFEqName}{#1\ottdruleWfTWFEqLabel}
}

\newcommand{\ottdefnHeaderWfTWF}[0]{$V  \mathbin{;}  sV  \vdash  A \, \ottkw{WF}$}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWfTWF}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{\ottdefnHeaderWfTWF}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFUnit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFPi{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFForall{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWfTWFEq{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppVarName}[0]{WfInertAppVar}

\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \notin  sV}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottmv{x} \, e \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertAppVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertAppVar{#2}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppAppLabel}[0]{WfInertAppApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)} \, e_{{\mathrm{3}}} \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertAppAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertAppApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfInertAppAppName}{#1\ottdruleWfInertAppAppLabel}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstName}[0]{WfInertAppSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstLabel}[0]{WfInertAppSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)} \, e_{{\mathrm{3}}} \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubst{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstName}{#1\ottdruleWfInertAppSubstLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVarName}[0]{WfInertSubstVar}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{y}  \notin  sV}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVarName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVarLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVar{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfInertSubstVarName}{#1\ottdruleWfInertSubstVarLabel}

\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppName}[0]{WfInertSubstApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppLabel}[0]{WfInertSubstApp}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{sV  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{3}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{4}}} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  e_{{\mathrm{3}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{4}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{:}  A  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B  \ottsym{,}  e  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertSubstApp{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppName}{#1\ottdruleWfInertSubstAppLabel}
}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstName}[0]{WfInertSubstSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstLabel}[0]{WfInertSubstSubst}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}%
}{
sV  \vdash  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{subst} \, \ottsym{(}  p  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  .\,  B_{{\mathrm{0}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  e_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{=}  e_{{\mathrm{4}}}  \ottsym{:}  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  .\,  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  e_{{\mathrm{5}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottkw{INERT}}{%
{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstName}{}%
}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstLabeled}[2][]{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubst{#2}%
  \ruleLabel{\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstName}{#1\ottdruleWfInertSubstSubstLabel}
}
